mapper.insert:
select board_seq.nextval from dual
insert into board(bid, writer, title, content, writedate, cnt) values(#{bid},#{writer},#{title},#{content}, sysdate,#{cnt})
mapper.update: update board set writer=#{writer},title=#{title},content=#{content},writedate= sysdate,cnt='0' where bid=#{bid}
mapper.select: select bid, writer, title, content, writedate, cnt from board order by bid desc
mapper.update: update board set cnt = cnt+1 where bid = #{bid}
mapper.select: select * from board where writer=#{writer} order by bid desc
